```{r prep, echo = FALSE, results = "hide", cache = FALSE}
## Create four possible arithmetic expressions
x <- c(
  "(7 - 3) * 4 - 2",
  "(2 * 3 + 4) / 2",
  "2 + 4 * 3 - 8",
  "(2 + 4) * 3 - 8"
)

## Sample one expression to use for the question
q <- sample(x, 1)
a <- eval(rlang::parse_expr(q))
```

Question
========
What value will the following R code produce?

`r q`

Solution
========
By applying the appropriate order of operations, we get `r a`.
